name: Aces of the Luftwaffe
description: YOU have to show what you’re made of as the war over Europe is in full swing. Fight waves of Axis planes and panzers until you hit the boss enemies – the ACES OF THE LUFTWAFFE.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 Processor: ~2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Pretty average arcade shooter. Entertaining for a short time until you have to grind. 4.5/10  Pros: - Looks nice - Interesting boss fights - Decent music and voices - Not particularly hard except bosses - Some achievements working as side objectives - Short levels for quick sessions  Cons: - Grindy for upgrades and achievements - Poor shmup mechanics except for bosses - Not much bullet pattern except a few attacks, so you can't avoid everything even if you learn. - Doesn't really matter if you're hit (except on bosses since they hit hard): it heals over time (or with power ups) and since there's not combo it doesn't interrupt anything. - No health indicator except bullet impact and cracked screen. - 3 pilots but you probably won't bother using the 3. - One pilot (Freshman) almost unplayable once upgraded: you can increase his movement speed, and once maxed it's way too fast with a controller. - Broken leaderboards (poor scoring method anyway, 'total kills' is just grinding)
*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~* Run, live to fly, fly to live, do or die ! Run, live to fly, fly to live ! Aces high ! *~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
